txt.en: Two Orc armies inhabit the Circle of Wrath in Minas Morgul.\n\nYou should venture forth and defeat Orcs from either army.
Defeat Orcs from either army in the Circle of Wrath ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
'You defeated Orcs from one of the armies in the Circle of Wrath, or dare I hope... from both? I am pleased to hear it, and to offer you my thanks.'

'Hail to you, and well-met! Our position in the city is a precarious one, and I hope you will be able to help us keep it! The outer ring of Minas Morgul is inhabited by two different armies of Orcs, and each of them stands in the way of the work we must do.\n\n'Would you defeat troops from either encampment as you encounter them, thereby helping us ensure we can accomplish our mission here? Good, good!'
Defeated Orcs in the Circle of Wrath ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to Thornaran and tell him you successfully defeated Orcs in Minas Morgul.
Two forces of Orcs are fortifying the outer ring of Minas Morgul. Thornaran has asked you to defeat warriors in either camp.
Circle of Wrath: Culling the Troops
